mapper.select:
select b.* from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(b PK_REPLY)*/ r.* , rownum rn from tbl_reply r where r.board_no = #{boardNo} order by rn ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5
and b.rn <= #{page} * 5
mapper.insert:
select reply_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_reply (reply_no, board_no, reply, replyer) values(#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select title , start_date as "start", end_date as "end" from tbl_event
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event (title, start_date, end_date) values(#{title}, #{start}, #{end})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_event where title = #{title} and start_date = #{start} and end_date = #{end}
